name: Shallow Worlds
description:
𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼

Shallow Worlds is a game about a cube that struggles to stay on the light side. Throughout the game it realizes that the dark side is a part of its journey and it has to embrace both sides. A short 2D platformer story game!

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹𝘀

- AD = Move left & right

- Space = Jump

- E = Switch Side

- R = Restart level

- Tab = Open pause menu

𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝘀

Programming, art and project setup were all made by Tudypie and AKilic in 7 days for the GeoJam.

Follow Tudypie on Twitter here. Follow AKilic on Twitter here
